Control Name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Inputs—Records of system input activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.

control_attributes.Control: Creates and Maintains Records of System Inputs—Records of system input activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory:
PI1.2 The entity implements policies and procedures over system inputs, including controls over completeness and accuracy, to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the
entity’s objectives.
